name: Outer Deltas
economy_niches: Reed and thatch for net/boat materials
Local piloting and shallow-water towing services
culture_adjustments: Heavier Riveric dialect influence in cant
Seasonal clan labor organized by tidal calendar
Practical ritual auguries tied to silt patterns
Stronger informal guild authority over shore labor
constraints: Limited arable land; reliance on imports
Dredging and major engineering controlled by guild permits
Ritual magic use depends on scarce imported reagents
notes: Clan-linked cooperative labor critical for nets/boats
Practical literacy focused on navigation accounts and tolls
